statements: SELECT * FROM public_opinion_polls;
SELECT question, response FROM public_opinion_polls;
SELECT * FROM public_opinion_polls WHERE id = 1;
SELECT question FROM public_opinion_polls WHERE response = 'Agree';
SELECT * FROM public_opinion_polls ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM public_opinion_polls WHERE response = 'Agree' ORDER BY question DESC;
SELECT question, COUNT(*) AS total_responses FROM public_opinion_polls GROUP BY question HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT DISTINCT response FROM public_opinion_polls WHERE question LIKE '%climate%' ORDER BY response ASC;

SELECT question, SUM(CASE WHEN response = 'Disagree' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS disagree_count, SUM(CASE WHEN response = 'Agree' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS agree_count FROM public_opinion_polls GROUP BY question;
SELECT id, question, response FROM public_opinion_polls WHERE LENGTH(question) > 20 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM opinion_polls;
SELECT question, answer FROM opinion_polls WHERE respondent_name='Alice';
SELECT id, question, answer FROM opinion_polls WHERE respondent_name='Bob';
SELECT * FROM surveys;
SELECT survey_name, question, answer_options FROM surveys WHERE id=1;
SELECT id, question, answer FROM opinion_polls WHERE respondent_name = 'Alice';
SELECT id, question, respondent_name FROM opinion_polls WHERE answer IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM opinion_polls WHERE question LIKE '%favorite%' AND answer NOT LIKE '%dislike%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, survey_name, question FROM surveys WHERE JSON_CONTAINS(answer_options, '"Yes"');
SELECT id, survey_name, survey_name AS question, answer_options->'$.option1' AS option1 FROM surveys ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM public_opinion_polls
SELECT id, question, options FROM public_opinion_polls WHERE id = 3
SELECT respondent_name, response, response_date FROM survey_responses ORDER BY response_date DESC
SELECT * FROM public_opinion_polls WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT decision_description, decision_maker FROM policy_decisions WHERE poll_id = 5
SELECT * FROM public_opinion_polls WHERE id = 1;
SELECT question, start_date, end_date FROM public_opinion_polls WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01';

SELECT policy_decisions.decision_date, policy_decisions.decision_maker, public_opinion_polls.question FROM policy_decisions JOIN public_opinion_polls ON policy_decisions.poll_id = public_opinion_polls.id;
SELECT respondent_name, response, response_date FROM survey_responses WHERE response_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE response LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY response_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM surveys;
SELECT question, options FROM surveys WHERE id = 1;
SELECT response_id, respondent_name, response_date FROM responses WHERE response_id = 10;
SELECT survey_id, respondent_age, response_rating FROM survey_results WHERE survey_id = 5;
SELECT decision_description, decision_date FROM policy_decisions WHERE implemented = true;
SELECT * FROM surveys;
SELECT question, options FROM surveys WHERE id = 1;
SELECT response_id, response_value, response_date FROM responses ORDER BY response_date DESC;
SELECT survey_id, AVG(response_rating) AS avg_rating FROM survey_results GROUP BY survey_id HAVING avg_rating > 4;
SELECT decision_id, decision_description, implemented FROM policy_decisions WHERE decision_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM public_opinion_polls WHERE poll_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT poll_name, poll_result FROM public_opinion_polls WHERE poll_result > 0.5;
SELECT respondent_name, respondent_age FROM survey_respondents WHERE respondent_age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT question_text, question_type FROM survey_questions WHERE question_category = 'Politics';
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE respondent_id = 123;
SELECT poll_id, poll_name, poll_date FROM public_opinion_polls;
SELECT respondent_id, respondent_name, respondent_age, respondent_city FROM survey_respondents ORDER BY respondent_age;
SELECT question_id, question_text, question_type, question_category FROM survey_questions WHERE question_type = 'multiple choice';
SELECT decision_id, decision_name, decision_date, decision_description FROM policy_decisions WHERE decision_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE response_value LIKE '%positive%';
